Places on Jane's list to go to !

```{r map, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(htmltools)
library(janitor)
library(htmlwidgets)

# --- Load Excel ---

places <- read_excel("placestogo.xlsx") %>%
clean_names()

# --- Create icon list (auto-match category to icon filename) ---

icon_path <- "icons"

place_icons <- icons(
iconUrl = paste0(icon_path, "/", tolower(places$category), ".png"),
iconWidth = 30,
iconHeight = 30,
popupAnchorX = 0,
popupAnchorY = -15
)

# --- Build popup HTML for each point ---

places$popup <- paste0(
"<b style='font-size:16px;'>", places$placename, "</b><br>",
"<i>", places$category, "</i><br><br>",
places$details, "<br><br>",
"<a href='", places$insta, "' target='_blank'>Insta</a><br>",
"<a href='", places$maps, "' target='_blank'>Maps</a>"
)

leaflet(places, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE)) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # replaced immediately by JS
  addMarkers(
    lng = ~long,
    lat = ~lat,
    popup = ~popup,
    icon = place_icons
  ) %>%
  onRender("
    function(el, x) {

      // --- 1. Define tile layers ---
      var light = L.tileLayer(
        'https://{s}.basemaps.cartocdn.com/light_all/{z}/{x}/{y}.png',
        { attribution: '© CartoDB' }
      );

      var dark = L.tileLayer(
        'https://{s}.basemaps.cartocdn.com/dark_all/{z}/{x}/{y}.png',
        { attribution: '© CartoDB' }
      );

      var map = this;

      // Remove the default tiles initially
      map.eachLayer(function(layer){
        if(layer instanceof L.TileLayer){
          map.removeLayer(layer);
        }
      });

      // --- 2. Function to set tiles based on user’s current time ---
      function updateTiles() {
        var hour = new Date().getHours();   // USER local hour

        // Remove all tile layers before switching
        map.eachLayer(function(layer){
          if(layer instanceof L.TileLayer){
            map.removeLayer(layer);
          }
        });

        if(hour >= 20 || hour < 6){
          dark.addTo(map);   // Night mode (8pm – 6am)
        } else {
          light.addTo(map);  // Day mode
        }
      }

      // --- 3. Initial load ---
      updateTiles();

      // --- 4. Auto-update every minute ---
      setInterval(updateTiles, 600000); // 600000 ms = 10 minutes

    }
  ")
```
